extension.valueString: Materiaal is corrosief en kan ernstige verwondingen aan de huid, slijmvliezen en ogen veroorzaken. Vermijd onbeschermd contact.
Material is corrosive and may cause severe injury to skin, mucous membranes and eyes. Avoid any unprotected contact.
Materiaal is explosief mengsel. Houd weg van vuur, vonken en hitte.
Material is an explosive mixture.  Keep away from fire, sparks, and heat.
Materiaal is licht ontvlambaar en kan in bepaalde mengsels (met lucht) leiden tot explosies. Houd weg van vuur, vonken en warmtebronnen.
Material is highly flammable and in certain mixtures (with air) may lead to explosions.  Keep away from fire, sparks and excessive heat.
Materiaal is hard en scherp (bijv. canules). Verwijder in harde container.
Material is solid and sharp (e.g., cannulas.)  Dispose in hard container.
Materiaal is een bron voor ioniserende straling en moet met uiterste voorzorgen worden gebruikt om letsel te voorkomen van degene die het gebruiken en milieuschade.
Material is a source for ionizing radiation and must be handled with special care to avoid injury of those who handle it and to avoid environmental hazards.
Materiaal is toxisch voor mensen en/of dieren. Let specifiek op vermijding van inname, ook van kleinere hoeveelheden.
Material is toxic to humans and/or animals.  Special care must be taken to avoid incorporation, even of small amounts.

description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0871 ( Supply Risk Codes)
name: v2.0871

text.div:
Supply Risk Codes

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
COR CorrosiveMaterial is corrosive and may cause severe injury to skin, mucous membranes and eyes. Avoid any unprotected contact.added v2.6
EXP ExplosiveMaterial is an explosive mixture. Keep away from fire, sparks, and heat.added v2.6
FLA FlammableMaterial is highly flammable and in certain mixtures (with air) may lead to explosions. Keep away from fire, sparks and excessive heat.added v2.6
INJ Injury HazardMaterial is solid and sharp (e.g., cannulas.) Dispose in hard container.added v2.6
RAD RadioactiveMaterial is a source for ionizing radiation and must be handled with special care to avoid injury of those who handle it and to avoid environmental hazards.added v2.6
TOX ToxicMaterial is toxic to humans and/or animals. Special care must be taken to avoid incorporation, even of small amounts.added v2.6
UNK UnknownMaterial hazard level is unknown.added v2.6

title: v2 Supply Risk Codes
